@graph.name: Crispy, Chewy, Matcha Green Tea Cookies - Kirbie's Cravings

itemListElement.name: Crispy, Chewy, Matcha Green Tea Cookies

@graph.name: Crispy, Chewy, Matcha Green Tea Cookies
@graph.description: The cookies are crunchy on the outside and soft and chewy on the inside.  The matcha green tea gives them a pretty color, too.

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C). In a small bowl, stir together flour, matcha green tea powder, baking soda, and baking powder. Set aside.
recipeInstructions.name: Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C). In a small bowl, stir together flour, matcha green tea powder, baking soda, and baking powder. Set aside.

recipeInstructions.text: In a large bowl, cream together the butter and sugar until smooth. Beat in egg and vanilla. Gradually blend in the dry ingredients. Roll dough into balls about one inch in diameter and flatten slightly to create round discs, and place onto ungreased cookie sheets.
recipeInstructions.name: In a large bowl, cream together the butter and sugar until smooth. Beat in egg and vanilla. Gradually blend in the dry ingredients. Roll dough into balls about one inch in diameter and flatten slightly to create round discs, and place onto ungreased cookie sheets.

recipeInstructions.text: Bake 8 to 10 minutes in the preheated oven, or until golden. Let stand on cookie sheet two minutes before removing to cool on wire racks.
recipeInstructions.name: Bake 8 to 10 minutes in the preheated oven, or until golden. Let stand on cookie sheet two minutes before removing to cool on wire racks.

@graph.keywords: green tea sugar cookies, matcha sugar cookies
